revision.comment: removed [[Category:Governors of Trinidad and Tobago]]; added [[Category:Governors of British Tobago]] using [[WP:HC|HotCat]]
revision.text:
{{Use British English|date=March 2013}} {{Use dmy dates|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox governor |honorific-prefix = Sir |name = Robert William Harley |honorific-suffix = |image = |alt = |order = |office = [[Governor of the Gold Coast]] |term_start = September 1872 |term_end = 2 October 1873 |lieutenant = |predecessor = [[Robert William Keate]] |successor = [[Garnet Joseph Wolseley]] |order2 = |office2 = [[Lieutenant Governor of Tobago]] |term_start2 = 1875 |term_end2 = 1877 |lieutenant2 = |predecessor2 = [[Herbert Taylor Ussher]] |successor2 = [[Augustus Frederick Gore]] |order3 = |office3 = [[Lieutenant Governor of Grenada]] |term_start3 = 1877 |term_end3 = 1882 |lieutenant3 = |predecessor3 = [[Cyril Clerke Graham]] |successor3 = Replaced by [[Administrator of Grenada]] |order4 = |office4 = [[Lieutenant Governor of British Honduras]] |term_start4 = 1883 |term_end4 = 1884 |lieutenant4 = |predecessor4 = [[Frederick Palgrave Barlee]] |successor4 = Replaced by [[Governor of British Honduras]] |birth_date = 1829 |birth_place = |death_date = {{BirthDeathAge|df=yes| |1829| | |1892|08|23}} |death_place = }} [[Colonel (United Kingdom)|Colonel]] '''Sir Robert William Harley''' [[Order of St Michael and St George|KCMG]], [[Companions of the Order of the Bath|CB]] (1829-23 August 1892) was a British [[colonial administrator]]. He served as [[governor-in-chief]] of the [[Gold Coast (British colony)|Gold Coast]], between September 1872 and 2 October 1873.
Harley was born in 1829 and joined the Army in 1847.<ref name="Times30789" /> He died on 23 August 1892 at the age of 62.<ref name="Times33726" />
==References== {{reflist|refs= <ref name="Times30789"> {{Cite newspaper The Times |articlename= The New Lieutenant-Governor of Honduras |section=News |day_of_week=Monday |date=9 April 1883 |page_number=7 |issue=30789 |column=D }}</ref> <ref name="Times33726"> {{Cite newspaper The Times |articlename= Deaths |section=Deaths |day_of_week=Thursday |date=25 August 1892 |page_number=1 |issue=33726 |column=A }}</ref> }} {{start box}}{{s-gov}} {{succession box | before=[[Robert William Keate]] | title=[[Governor of the Gold Coast]] | years=1872–1873 | after=[[Garnet Joseph Wolseley]] }} {{succession box | title = [[Lieutenant Governor of Tobago]] | before = [[Herbert Taylor Ussher]] | after = [[Augustus Frederick Gore]] | years = 1875–1877 }} {{succession box | title = [[Lieutenant Governor of Grenada]] | before = [[Cyril Clerke Graham]] | after = Replaced by Administrator of Grenada | years = 1877–1882 }} {{succession box | title = [[Lieutenant Governor of British Honduras]] | before = [[Frederick Palgrave Barlee]] | after = Replaced by Governor of British Honduras | years = 1883–1884 }} {{end box}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Harley, Robert William}} [[Category:1829 births]] [[Category:1892 deaths]]<!-- 23 August 1892 --> [[Category:Companions of the Order of the Bath]] [[Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George]] [[Category:West India Regiment officers]] [[Category:Governors of British Tobago]] [[Category:Governors of British Honduras]] [[Category:Governors of the Gold Coast]] [[Category:Governors of British Grenada]]
